Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: There were complimentary pastries in reception in the afternoon the bed was very comfy and there was a complimentary safe in the room The shower was gorgeous too and the air conditioning in the room was a must The receptionist was very helpful friendly and spoke very good English He arranged our taxi to collect us from the airport and to take us back at the end of our trip

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Lighting was a technological challenge Air conditioning was inadequate to maintain reasonable comfort level on hot late June evenings
Positive_Review: Great boutique hotel Room was cozy Bathroom was renovated recently Breakfast was delicious with many options including fresh fruit cheeses eggs cooked to order and breads Staff were courteous and helpful

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: The hotel is almost on the Rue La Bo tie grocery store restaurents etc close to the middle section of Avenue des Champs lys es with two Metro stations Saint Philippe du Roule and Franklin D Roosevelt in quick walking distance As a result the Arc de Triomphe Place de la Concorde Trocad ro and major museums are either within walking distance or just a few Metro stops away The staff is very courteous and room maintenance impeccable On the noon of May 14th we walked the Rue La Bo tie towards Avenue des Champs lys es and saw Emmanuel Macron waving at us before his sworn in as a new president Quite an experience thanks to the location of this hotel

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Only the Elevator is too small but not a problem
Positive_Review: Location is great just 5 minutes walk to Metro Station Great choices of food nearby the hotel Staffs are fantastic helpful and very friendly

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Had to ask the front desk to turn on the AC in my room A small observation as things are done differently in Europe
Positive_Review: The hotel staff were courteous and extremely knowledgeable They were very very helpful and it made my trip seamless I felt safe and secure and the bed was a dream Not to mention the view from my room was amazing Great value for money

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: Technology in the room was Amazing Location was perfect Really close to the Champs Elysees but far enough to still be quiet Room was larger than most paris hotel rooms

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Breakfast was very mediocre poor and extremely overpriced 18 Euros per day Not much variety in the breakfast meal and we got more variety of food at different Cafes for breakfast at a much cheaper price than the hotel s breakfast Tiny elevator lift Small tight room
Positive_Review: Excellent location 5 minute walk to the Champs Elysees 20 minute walk to the Eiffel Tower 20 minute walk to Printemps department store Next to alot of small cafes pharmacies local stores Helpful Staff Quick in cleaning and preparing the room Quiet hotel

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The breakfast is not to our expectation considering a 4 stars hotel The street was very noisy from 3 30 to 4 30 am due to night clubs in the neighbourhood
Positive_Review: The location is easy accessible to the main locations The stuff is friendly

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: This was a comfortable boutique hotel located close to the Champs Elysees The area has plenty of restaurants bars and cafes Do not that some of these more local intimate restaurants do close on a Sunday

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: It is perhaps closer to 3 5 star than 4 and the rooms are small but to be expected in Paris and the location makes up for this
Positive_Review: The location the staff who were amazing

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The area is within a night club district During the early hours there are a lot if noise disturbances which resonate all the way to the hotel
Positive_Review: The location was great a small walking distance to main street shopping and tourist attractions

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The hotel is tinny and the rooms very small There s a night club across the street from the hotel and the hooting and traffic at 4am is unpleasent
Positive_Review: I liked help from the staff and the area

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Breakfast offered is very expensive can get cheaper in any cafe nearby
Positive_Review: Good location close to restaurants cafes and shopping the room was clean and modern wifi worked very well

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The airco did not seem to work well so opened windows instead The wireless did not work at all for me
Positive_Review: A small hotel but nicely located near many bars and restaurants It s a 15 minute pretty straight forward walk to the Eiffel Tower The room was great Nice comfortable bed with big TV screen Windows can be openend to look into the streets When closed it s a quiet area even as my room was located on a corner overlooking a few restaurants The light system works with a button panel next to the bed which you need to play around with a bit One of them incl a buzzer to open the door Not unsafe just makes an expected noise if you try to switch off the lights The toilet is separated from the bathroom which is nice if you travel in pairs The shower was nice clean and spacious I would be better to fix it higher than 1 80 meter for people taller than this There is space enough so not sure why they fixed it like this Can highly recommend this hotel for a weekend or longer if you need to be in Paris Centre

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: lack of air con in room had to be used in all rooms or none room was too hot Drain in bathroom sink smelled Hotel was noisey in the early hours of the morning We were told we would be able to buy tickets for eiffel tower through the hotel but then told this was incorrect when we arrived
Positive_Review: location size of room bed tv large staff friendly enough

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The room was very very small the toilet was extremely small price was far too expensive for what we got and breakfast was too expensive for what was on offer
Positive_Review: The location and friendliness of staff

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: the housekeeping is good but could be better
Positive_Review: They offered me an early check in around 8 00am for free and they also received my mail before my arrival and found everything in my room when I checked in that was amazing

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Nothing really If pushed I would say the lift is tiny as it is in so many older hotel buildings in Paris and the switches in the bedroom are far too complicated I shouldn t need instructions on how to operate the lights But that s a very minor detail
Positive_Review: Room was larger than expected if a little excentric in decor think gold and mirrors and checkin out friendly and easy Found a nice place to hold a meeting with my colleague Breakfast was good

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: Staff is super helpful and i am impressed their pre arrival service to make recommendation while you are around in Paris They response on request is very fast too

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: The communications with the hotel and it s staff were excellent from the word go This continued on arrival until departure with useful information and advice The hotel was a unique find in terms of location d cor and ambience The room was large and well equipped and the bed very large and comfortable The bathroom also was well appointed and equipped had a separate toilet Would I return yes

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The shower was a rainforest head and water pressure was average so not brilliant Shower head couldn t be angled
Positive_Review: Staff were super helpful without been in your face Bed was comfy Breakfast was excellent

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Checked us into a twin room rather than double which we booked We didn t know this until we opened the door Swapped without fuss though
Positive_Review: Excellent buffet breakfast Good value for money Close to Underground for route into central London

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The room was really small should be highlithed better In the photos the rooms appear bigger Also the building was really small
Positive_Review: Excellent position

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Breakfast cost 36 for a couple of croissants small scrambled egg and 2 little glasses of Orange juice Small bottle of wine 23 the same was in the shop afew doors down for 8
Positive_Review: Excellent location

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Maybe the colors of the hotel they re so dark with such a small space and I didn t like that the bathroom has no door
Positive_Review: I like the cleanliness and the staff is amazing

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The only fault I have is that there was no coffee tea making facilities in the room otherwise can not fault this place
Positive_Review: Staff were very helpfull and friendly Location great Excellent bars and restaurants nearby

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The pillows were a little uncomfortable but that is the only minor issue we had
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and helpful the location was brilliant Breakfast was nice and the room was really clean and well decorated The value for money was excellent Will definitely go back and recommend

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The lift is very small Breakfast is expensive
Positive_Review: Great location 5 mins walk to Champs Elysees My room had a bath tub a samsung tablette USB plugs for charger fairly spacious room helpful staff at the reception Smooth check in She also speaks english

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Nothing really it was all pretty good
Positive_Review: The hotel was in a great area close to great shopping and within easy walking distance of a lot of tourist attractions The Metro was just around the corner

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Our room had a toilet in a separate room on the opposite side of the room from the shower sink which was awkward Bed was a little stiff but not bad
Positive_Review: Excellent location Staff was very friendly Rooms were very modern and designed well Great value for the location

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: Reception staff were really kind spoke very good English and extremely helpful Location could not be better just off the Champs Elyses Will go back

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: No hot water When I complained at reception they told me there had been a lot of rain whatever that has to do with hot water I don t know Also no water in the room I was charged 8 for two bottles of water fro the mini bar and also I was charged an unexplained 3 taxi charge Hotel is by no means four star It is weird to say the least d cor is a mix of Asian and 1930s style Hallways are dark and rooms are very small Ok hotel but to expensive for what it is
Positive_Review: Location is good very central and easy to get to everywhere

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The location was also bad Near a nightclub and was very noisy Ok with the windows closed but we wanted them open
Positive_Review: The hotel was small and charming But the rooms were very good size The staff were AMAZING The location was both good and bad Only 2 blocks off the Champs lys es and close to museums

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: The hotel is situated in a very good location only 100 200 m from Chaps Elysees and metro station Hotel is quite small and very quiet Room was very clean and breakfast tasty

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Most regret upon checkout was presented bill for breakfast as it was presented as part of reservation they wanted 200 euros Paid 175 felt We were robbed couldn t dispute as we leaving
Positive_Review: Yes patisserie was excellent room small but nicely decorated most rooms in major cities have small rooms staff was most accomodating

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The lighting in the bedrooms took a bit of getting used to
Positive_Review: We loved everything Very unique decoration bedrooms excellent location very attentive staff and value for money

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The light controls were very difficult to understand and use
Positive_Review: Great location but was very quiet at night Friendly and helpful staff Comfy bed and lovely clean bathroom

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: towel rail did not work not sure air conditioning was working properly as room was very warm and too cold to leave window open
Positive_Review: very convenient location staff were most helpful bed was very comfortable

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: I realise the hotel can t help this as its to do with the location but the traffic noise at night was really bad cars honking at each other quite often all through the night
Positive_Review: Staff were brilliant food was lovely hotel was cosy

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: When we went to the hotel our room key wouldn t work our room was not cleaned in the afternoon when we got back so we had to ask for it to be done The room was cold in the evening so we had to keep asking for the heating to be put on there was a ketal in our room we were asked to fill it in the bathroom so we had to buy water outside And when we wanted room service we had to go down our self as they had no staff

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: It is near to the Champs lys es and several metro station Safety can be sure as well The double room is much bigger than my imagination Anyway it is good to be here

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: Beautiful rooms Staff efficient Great location just a couple blocks off the Champs Elysee and in a very trendy area Loved it Will go back again

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Bar could be stocked a little better as there was no lemonade for Martini and no ice
Positive_Review: The Staff are the true asset here Breakfast is simply the best I have had at any 4 property in Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The lightswitches are a bit over complicated
Positive_Review: Well located hotel near the Champs Elysees and close to shops restaurants etc Rooms have been modernised and are comfortable well furnished and clean Wifi worked well

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: Excellent Staff Ruben and Gerard were very warm and offered excellent service The lady making breakfast was very friendly and talkative and had this permanent smile on her face

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: The rooms were very quaint Updated and modern Very clean The location was excellent The staff was very helpful I will definitely stay here again

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Went to get my bag at 6 in evening and had to wait 10 mins before getting it Had a cab waiting 3 other people waiting to check in as well Not very happy
Positive_Review: Very friendly

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: Location was fantastic Staff were friendly and attentive Very clean and comfortable We were too late for breakfast one morning so they bought it to us in bed

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The French like to beep their horns and unfortunately for us at 1am on our first night there a lorry was unloading outside the hotel with a queue of cars behind that literally beeped their horns continuously for 10 minutes This happened again 2 nights later at 3am Was a tad noisy for sleeping but not the hotels fault
Positive_Review: The location was really central Lovely rooms and really friendly staff

Hotel_Name: H tel des Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The standard room is a bit of a squeeze but if you re out in the day it s not an issue
Positive_Review: Location is very good short walk to champs elysees The staff were very helpful and the room was lovely

Negative_Review: Light switches were difficult to use The breakfast was poor Not much choice for 18
